Episodes.Title: Sassenach
Episodes.Plot: While on her honeymoon, WWII combat nurse Claire Randall is mysteriously transported back to 1743 Scotland, where she is kidnapped by a group of Highlanders - and meets an injured young man named Jamie.

Episodes.Title: Castle Leoch
Episodes.Plot: Claire is taken to meet the Laird. As suspicions about her grow, Claire befriends the mysterious Geillis Duncan. When the clan discover her medical skills, Claire goes from guest to prisoner.

Episodes.Title: The Way Out
Episodes.Plot: Claire decides to use her medical skills to aid her escape from Castle Leoch - with Jamie's help, she tends to an ill child. During an evening's entertainment, a story gives Claire hope for her freedom.

Episodes.Title: The Gathering
Episodes.Plot: As the Castle prepares for The Gathering, Claire plots her escape. But after a dangerous encounter with a drunken Dougal and an unexpected run-in with Jamie, her plans are dashed.

Episodes.Title: Rent
Episodes.Plot: Claire joins the MacKenzie rent-collecting trip. To her horror, Dougal uses Jamie's scars to gain sympathy for the Jacobite cause. Claire recalls that a defining moment in Scottish history is fast approaching.

Episodes.Title: The Garrison Commander
Episodes.Plot: Claire's unexpected meeting with a British general turns tense when Captain Jack Randall arrives. Claire finds herself alone with Randall - a dangerous man determined to uncover her secrets.

Episodes.Title: The Wedding
Episodes.Plot: Claire and Jamie are thrown together in marriage, but as their emotional and physical relationship unfolds, deeper feelings arise. Claire is ultimately torn between two men in two very different times.

Episodes.Title: Both Sides Now
Episodes.Plot: Frank desperately searches for his missing wife, while Claire tries to come to terms with her new marriage. Claire is faced with an emotional quandry as a life-altering opportunity presents itself.

Episodes.Title: The Reckoning
Episodes.Plot: Jamie and the Highlanders rescue Claire from Black Jack Randall. Back at the castle, politics threaten to tear Clan MacKenzie apart and Jamie's scorned lover, Laoghaire, attempts to win him back.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
Episodes.Plot: Jamie hopes the Duke of Sandringham can help remove the price on his head, while Claire works to save an abandoned child.

Episodes.Title: The Devil's Mark
Episodes.Plot: Claire and Geillis are on trial for witchcraft. Jamie manages to rescue Claire, but not before she discovers a secret about Geillis' past.

Episodes.Title: Lallybroch
Episodes.Plot: Claire and Jamie are reunited and head to his family home, where old animosities between Jamie and his sister, Jenny, are rekindled.

Episodes.Title: The Watch
Episodes.Plot: Jamie finds himself between a rock and a hard place when a redcoat deserter from his past resurfaces. Claire tends to a laboring Jenny while Jamie and Ian join The Watch, resulting in devastating consequences.

Episodes.Title: The Search
Episodes.Plot: Claire and Jenny set out to rescue Jamie from his redcoat captors. When Murtagh joins up, they turn to unorthodox tactics to send word to Jamie. When word finally arrives, the news isn't what anyone had hoped.

Episodes.Title: Wentworth Prison
Episodes.Plot: Jamie awaits his death sentence at Wentworth Prison, while Claire and the Highlanders search for a rescue plan. When Jamie is visited by Black Jack, he realizes there is a fate worse than death.

Episodes.Title: To Ransom a Man's Soul
Episodes.Plot: A desperate plan manages to free Jamie, but his wounds are more than just physical. At a nearby monastery, Claire attempts to save both Jamie's heart and soul, as his mind lingers on the torture.
Episodes.Writer: Ira Steven Behr, Ronald D. Moore
